Sentencas: Natural gas is one of the most attractive fuels for solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC), while the anode activity for methane fuel has a great influence on the performance and stability of SOFC.
Titulo: High performance of direct methane-fuelled solid oxide fuel cell with samarium modified nickelbased anode

Sentencas: Samarium is a good catalyst promoter for methane reforming.
Titulo: High performance of direct methane-fuelled solid oxide fuel cell with samarium modified nickelbased anode

Sentencas: In this work, samarium is used to modify nickel catalyst, which results in small nickel oxide particles.
Titulo: High performance of direct methane-fuelled solid oxide fuel cell with samarium modified nickelbased anode

Sentencas: The SmNi-YSZ (yttria-stabilized zirconia) anode has smaller particles and better interfacial contact between nickel and YSZ compared with conventional Ni-YSZ anode.
Titulo: High performance of direct methane-fuelled solid oxide fuel cell with samarium modified nickelbased anode

Sentencas: The fine structure of SmNi-YSZ anode results in high activity for electrochemical oxidation of hydrogen and low polarization resistance of the cell.
Titulo: High performance of direct methane-fuelled solid oxide fuel cell with samarium modified nickelbased anode

Sentencas: The performance of SmNi-YSZ anode cell with humidified methane as fuel is greatly improved, which is similar to that with hydrogen as fuel.
Titulo: High performance of direct methane-fuelled solid oxide fuel cell with samarium modified nickelbased anode

Sentencas: The maximum power densities of SmNi-YSZ anode cell are 1.56 W cm(-2) for humidified hydrogen fuel and 1.54 W cm(-2) for humidified methane fuel at 800 degrees C.
Titulo: High performance of direct methane-fuelled solid oxide fuel cell with samarium modified nickelbased anode

Sentencas: The maximum power density is increased by 221% when samarium is used to modify Ni-YSZ anode for humidified methane fuel at 650 degrees C. High cell performance results in good stability of SmNi-YSZ anode cell and the cell runs stably for more than 600 min for humidified methane fuel.
Titulo: High performance of direct methane-fuelled solid oxide fuel cell with samarium modified nickelbased anode
